Docs.summary: Registers the container with Recovery Services vault. This is an asynchronous operation. To track the operation status, use location header to call get latest status of the operation. Request Path: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupFabrics/{fabricName}/protectionContainers/{containerName} Operation Id: ProtectionContainers_Register
Docs.exception: , or is an empty string, and was expected to be non-empty.
